summary: This mod is a small collection of those weapons which already exists in game but cannot be crafted, so i made them craftable.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a small collection of those weapons which already exists in game but cannot be crafted, so i made them craftable (note: weapons can be found in Ebony, Dwarven and Misc tab) and tweaked the damage value, price and enchantment a little bit to make them more powerfull.

This file only relies on skyrim.esm and update.esm so no other DLCs required but the game must be ver 1.9.32.0.8 for this mod to run.
author: Naren
